Author: 4foot11
Text: Please please please stop. I started the same way as you. I binged once and I successfully purged. And then like you I thought “ok this can be a back up plan in case I binge again”. Next thing you know I’m in a hell cycle of binging and purging multiple times a day. My teeth are so weak now. I literally broke my tooth chewing gum. Please don’t try purging again. I wish I could go back in time and stop myself from starting.

Author: etonflesh
Text: don’t start this.  honestly please don’t.  not only is it so much more dangerous than restricting, it doesn’t even work! i have heart problems now due to an/bp, and all i’ve done is gain and lose the same 2 kg for the last six months. trust me, it’s not worth it.  look after yourself x
